pageProduct.name: Aveeno Active Naturals Daily Moisturising Sheer Hydration Fragrance Free Lotion 350mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

AVEENO® Daily Moisturising Lotion Sheer Hydration 350mL

This naturally hydrating ultra sheer body lotion is fast-absorbing, for a fresh, light feel you'll want to use year-round. This moisturiser's unique formula with Active Naturals Colloidal Oatmeal goes on feather-light to replenish and hydrate your skin. Aveeno Daily Moisturising Lotion Sheer Hydration moisturises for a full 24 hours, for velvety soft, beautiful, healthy-looking skin.


  • Non-greasy moisturiser that absorbs in seconds

  • Lightweight on the skin

  • Fragrance-free

  • Non-comedogenic (won't clog pores)

  • Dermatologist tested

  • Clinically proven to hydrate skin for 24 hours

  • Contains natural colloidal oatmeal to moisturise dry skin


Aveeno Active Naturals are derived from nature and uniquely formulated to reveal skin's natural health and beauty. Essential Active Naturals ingredients: Colloidal Oatmeal.

Size: 350mL

Shelf Life in Days: 730 days

KEY FEATURES

• Sheer Hydration
• Light Feel
• Absorbs in Seconds
• Fragrance Free
• Dermatologist Tested




Ingredients

Water, Dicaprylyl Ether, Glycerin, Caprylic/-Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Cetearyl Alcohol, Palmitic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Stearic Acid, Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Ceteareth-20, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Chlorphenesin, Citric Acid, Lauric Acid, Arachidic Acid. (12714-155)
